name: Cruel Santino
description: '''Osayaba Andrew Ize-Iyamu''', better known by his [[stage name]] '''Cruel Santino''', is a Nigerian alternative singer-songwriter, rapper and director. He is a member of Monster Boys collective, with music producers Genio Bambino, and [[GMK (producer)|GMK]]. He was signed to [[Interscope Records]], in partnership with Monster Boy, and [[Warner Chappell Music]]. Santino's debut into the music scene was met with critical acclaim when he released his studio album ''[[Mandy & The Jungle]]'', introducing the [[alt√©]] fashion, and music, into the mainstream, notably with his track "Rapid Fire".
